scripts.lint: npm run app:api:lint && npm run app:dapp:lint
scripts.app:api:dev: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,NODE" -c "#d531f5,#4d5ffa" "npm run app:api:watch:babel" "npm run app:api:dev:watch:nodemon"
scripts.app:api:build: NODE_ENV=production npx rimraf ./apps/api/build && npm run app:api:babel
scripts.build:api: NODE_ENV=production npm run package:core:build && npm run package:api:build && npm run app:api:build
scripts.build:backend: NODE_ENV=production npm run package:core:build && npm run app:backend:build
scripts.app:api:dev2: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,NODE" -c "#dddddd,#aaaaaa,#777777" "npm run app:api:watch:babel" "npm run app:api:watch:node"
scripts.app:backend:dev: PORT=$(grep DEV_BACKEND_PORT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) REACT_APP_API_URL=$(grep '^BASE_URL_API' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true npm run start -w backend
scripts.app:backend:translations: echo "Please run 'npm run i18n-extract' right in the ./app/backend folder"
scripts.app:frontend:dev: PORT=$(grep DEV_FRONTEND_PORT .env | cut -d '=' -f2) NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=$(grep '^DEV_API_GRAPHQL_URL' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) npm run dev -w frontend
scripts.package:api:dev: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,TYPINGS" -c "#dddddd,#aaaaaa,#777777" "npm run package:api:watch:babel" "npm run package:api:watch:typings"
scripts.package:api:build: npx rimraf ./packages/api/dist && npm run package:api:db:generate && npm run package:api:nexus && npm run package:api:babel && npm run package:api:typings
scripts.package:api:test:db:push: NODE_ENV=test dotenv -c test -- npx prisma db push --force-reset
scripts.package:api:test:db:studio: NODE_ENV=test dotenv -c test -- npx prisma studio
scripts.package:api:test: NODE_ENV=test npm run package:api:test:db:push && npm run package:api:test:db:seed && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules dotenv -c test -- npx jest --detectOpenHandles --runInBand --roots ./packages/api/tests --setupTestFrameworkScriptFile=./packages/api/tests/setup.ts --collectCoverageFrom=./packages/api/src/**/*.ts --coverage
scripts.package:core:dev: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,TYPINGS" -c "#dddddd,#aaaaaa,#777777" "npm run package:core:watch:babel" "npm run package:core:watch:typings"
scripts.package:core:build: npx rimraf ./packages/core/dist && npm run package:core:babel && npm run package:core:typings
scripts.plugin:example:dev: npx concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "BABEL,TYPINGS" -c "#dddddd,#aaaaaa,#777777" "npm run plugin:example:watch:babel" "npm run plugin:example:watch:typings"
scripts.plugin:example:build: npx rimraf ./plugins/example/dist && npm run plugin:example:babel && npm run plugin:example:typings
